message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth more than $100 to me, but I understand its value might be different for you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $95. This is a great opportunity to get a high-quality item at a reasonable price.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only willing to pay up to $80 for it.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your valuation of the product. However, given the cost and value I've invested in this product, I cannot agree to $80. How about we meet in the middle at $85? I believe this is a fair compromise that respects both our positions.
